description: Welcome to "Echoes of Transformation: London Through Time," where you'll embark on a journey exploring the evolution of London’s architecture, from its historic brick and stone buildings to the towering glass and steel skyscrapers of today. The city’s ever-changing skyline reflects the shifting ideas, technologies, and values that have shaped it over the centuries.

events.name: Drop in: Exhibition & Workshop
events.notes: Tours will run on the hour until 12:00.

factsheet.heading: About event
paragraphs: Welcome to "Echoes of Transformation: London Through Time," where you'll embark on a journey exploring the evolution of London’s architecture, from its historic brick and stone buildings to the towering glass and steel skyscrapers of today. The city’s ever-changing skyline reflects the shifting ideas, technologies, and values that have shaped it over the centuries.

To begin, we will introduce you to Temple Bar London, a stunning example of this theme, through a historical presentation. Afterwards, you'll have the chance to explore this landmark during our guided tour. Following the tour, you'll be invited to view a selection of our own works inspired by this theme, which we hope will spark your creativity during the workshop.

In the workshop, you’ll have the opportunity to design your vision of London’s transformation by building city models and creating collages, allowing your imagination to shape your city. We look forward to you joining us on this historical journey and creative experience.

factsheet.heading: City Curators
paragraphs: This event is part of Open House Festival's City Curators programme.

location.address: First Floor, Paternoster Lodge, 2 Paternoster Square, EC4M 7DX

name: Echoes of Transformation: London Through Time
